section.para: The ngx_http_gzip_static_module module allows to send precompressed files with the “.gz” filename extension instead of regular files.
This module is not built by default, it should be enabled with the --with-http_gzip_static_module configuration parameter.

para.example: gzip_static on; gzip_proxied expired no-cache no-store private auth;

directive.name: gzip_static
directive.para: Enables or disables checking the existence of precompressed files. The following directives are also taken into account: , , , and .
The files can be compressed using the gzip command, or any other compatible. It is recommended that the modification date and time of original and compressed files be the same.
